TICKETS & INFO

Tickets

HOODSTOCK at the Blackbox will continue to be a not-for-profit event for friends and family to be together and enjoy great music and fun!

We are not advertising the event publicly, however we have lots of tickets available and would love to fill up the venue so please feel free to pass on the info to anyone who you think would want to come along and enjoy the day.

We are fully embracing the fact that it is pirate weekend in Hastings, so feel free to grab your eye patches and pirate hats to join in the fun!

Everyone who wishes to attend HOODSTOCK at the Blackbox (including children) will need to have a ticket in advance so you can collect your wristband on the day.

Tickets are available to order from Eventbrite.

  • Adult day tickets: £10
  • Kids under 18: free

All children must be accompanied by an adult ticket holder and must be supervised.

Depending on capacity, we may be able to offer on the day entry. We will let people know if there are door tickets available 24 hours before the event. Adult tickets purchased at the door will be £20. We will not be able to accommodate children at the door.

Getting There

The Blackbox is based in George Street in the centre of Hastings Old Town. It’s about a 15-minute walk from Hastings train station.

If you are planning on driving, there are a few car parks around the Hastings old town area or at Priory Meadow shopping centre in the main town centre of Hastings. Hastings is likely to be very busy that day so leave plenty of time to get to the car parks.

What to Bring

  • You won’t need to bring too much with you. Please make sure you have your registration confirmation to collect your wristband.
  • Younger children may benefit from having ear defenders. We will have small foam ones if you need them.
  • Small change for the sweet shop
  • Don’t forget your Pirate hats!

HOODSTOCK is a private, not for profit event. All attendees must register via Eventbrite. Questions? Email contact@hoodstock.rocks.
